questions.question: The ship …………………….. during the hurricane.
questions.description: Founder means sink or go under.

questions.question: Most of her arguments were ………………………. on facts.
questions.description: Founded means based or rested. It is the past tense of found.

questions.question: The explorers have ………………………… something amazing.
questions.description: Found is the past tense form of find.

questions.question: It was a neighborhood accustomed to …………………… crimes.
questions.description: Foul means disgusting. A fowl is a chicken or a related bird.

questions.question: He was charged with ………………………… for selling deeds to nonexistent land.
Several vice presidents were involved in the …………………………
The headmaster ………………………… the boys for their irresponsible behaviour.
questions.description: To flay is to censure harshly.

questions.question: Although she is rich she does not like to ……………………….. it.
questions.description: To flaunt is to show off something.

questions.question: Those who ……………………….. the rules shall be dismissed.
questions.description: To flout is to show contempt for something.

questions.question: Lack of civilian clothes was the one ……………………….. in our escape plan.
We caught only a ……………………….. glimpse of the Presidential motorcade.
